description: The transition season. Too cold and windy for long sleeves alone, still warm enough to leave the jacket at home. Designed to shoulder the days in between, this high-performance, extremely light running vest is windproof, water resistant, cut with 4-way stretch fabric and comes with the critical details you need to cut through the conditions. The perfect performance vest for your next PB.
name: Odlo Zeroweight Warm Running Vest  - Mens
